CustomField.description: Displays an image (red, yellow, green) for each possible track status.
CustomField.formula: IMAGE( CASE( Track_Status__c , "On Schedule", "/img/samples/flag_green.gif", "Potential Risk", "/img/samples/flag_yellow.gif", "At Risk", "/img/samples/flag_red.gif", "/s.gif"), "track status indicator")
CustomField.label: Track Status Icon
